title: 6 undeniable truths about Nick Cave… according to Nick Cave
text:
Nick Cave is many things. From his noisy beginnings with The Birthday Party, via murderous melodies spun for The Bad Seeds, to the twisted rock’n’roll he has created at the prow of Grinderman – not to forget the soundtracks, novels and films he's written – the apocalyptic crooner has been a hard man to pin down.

But if there’s anyone who can uncover some truths about the shape-shifting piano-player then it’s the artist himself.

Ahead of the release of Nick Cave and The Bad Seeds' new two-part album 'Ghosteen' (6 Music's Album of the Day on Friday 4 October), 6 Music has devoted an entire hour to Nick Cave: In His Own Words, which you can listen to now (available until 28 October 2019). And speaking of fellow musical greats, 6 Music is also airing PJ Harvey: In Her Own Words (available until 27 October).

Here are just 6 truths about the legendary musician that spill from Cave’s own mouth…
description: The apocalyptic crooner spills the beans on what makes him tick
